name: Three Card Draw
description: Past, Present, Future - a simple but powerful spread for insight into your life's timeline

positions.name: Past
positions.roleHint: past influences and experiences that shape your current situation

positions.name: Present
positions.roleHint: current situation, challenges, and opportunities in your life right now

positions.name: Future
positions.roleHint: potential outcomes and what the future may hold based on current path

name: Celtic Cross
description: Traditional 10-card spread providing comprehensive insight into your situation

positions.name: Present Situation
positions.roleHint: the heart of the matter, your current situation or the central issue

positions.name: Challenge
positions.roleHint: what crosses you, the challenge or obstacle you face

positions.name: Distant Past
positions.roleHint: distant past, foundation of the situation, what is behind you

positions.name: Recent Past
positions.roleHint: recent past, what is just behind you and leading to current situation

positions.name: Possible Outcome
positions.roleHint: possible outcome, what may come to pass if things continue as they are

positions.name: Near Future
positions.roleHint: near future, what is directly ahead of you in the immediate future

positions.name: Your Approach
positions.roleHint: your approach, how you see yourself in this situation

positions.name: External Influences
positions.roleHint: external influences, how others see you or what affects you from outside

positions.name: Hopes and Fears
positions.roleHint: hopes and fears, what you most hope for or fear in this situation

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.roleHint: final outcome, the ultimate result of all the factors at play

name: Horseshoe Spread
description: Seven card guidance spread for exploring a specific question or situation

positions.name: Past Influences
positions.roleHint: past influences that are affecting your current situation

positions.name: Present Situation
positions.roleHint: your current situation and where you stand right now

positions.name: Hidden Influences
positions.roleHint: hidden influences and factors you may not be aware of

positions.name: Obstacles
positions.roleHint: obstacles and challenges you need to overcome

positions.name: External Influences
positions.roleHint: external influences and how others affect your situation

positions.name: Advice
positions.roleHint: advice and the best course of action to take

positions.name: Outcome
positions.roleHint: likely outcome if you follow the advice and guidance given

name: Relationship Cross
description: Five card spread focused on relationship dynamics and partnership insights

positions.name: Your Position
positions.roleHint: your feelings, thoughts, and position in the relationship

positions.name: Their Position
positions.roleHint: their feelings, thoughts, and position in the relationship

positions.name: The Connection
positions.roleHint: the connection between you, what bonds or separates you

positions.name: Challenges
positions.roleHint: challenges and obstacles in the relationship

positions.name: Potential
positions.roleHint: the potential and future possibilities of the relationship

positions.name: Action to Take

positions.name: Outcome

name: Decision Making
description: Seven card spread to help you make important life decisions

positions.name: The Decision

positions.name: Option A

positions.name: Option B

positions.name: What You Know

positions.name: What You Don't Know
positions.roleHint: hidden factors and information you may be missing

positions.name: Your Instinct
positions.roleHint: what your intuition and inner wisdom are telling you

positions.name: Best Path Forward
